title: Web Application Developer
content: Developed an event management application featuring participant management, QR-based attendance tracking, and automated certificate generation.

title: Web Developer
content: Built a corporate website with an integrated product ordering system connected directly to WhatsApp based on client requirements.

title: Web Application Developer

title: Project Leader
